nodes.text: Bloggin-oil was a type of oil which could be harvested from members of the bloggin species native to the desert planet Jakku. The occupants of Tuanul village on Jakku used bloggin-oil as fuel in their lamps around thirty years after the Battle of Endor.
Bloggin-oil was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in 2015.
